name: Numbers Counting Game
description:
Numbers Counting Game is one of our educational games for kids whose parents are interested in early education of their babies in the field of maths, especially in baby numbers and counting.

If you are looking for a free maths counting to install, then this numbers counting game is ideal for the preschooler, kindergarten, and children of grade 1.

Help your toddler or preschool child learn the numbers counting and more with this easy to use app designed for kids and parents to play together. Numbers Counting Game features bright, colorful games that teach while children play, making it easy to learn basic number and counting knowledge from a convenient all-in-one app.

Numbers counting game is one of the extremely useful, education free games for kids because the activity of counting numbers has been presented in an innovative manner for kids apart from being free on the Android platform.

Learn to Count – Several types of objects will be displayed on the screen. Children count the objects and tap on each one to learn numbers individually.
